file_content.text: The entire Empire is in your debt.
My lord. We are honored.
How fitting that a fellow Dark Council member crushed the traitor.
Our war council welcomes your return, sir.
The Dark Council is most impressed with your performance.
Join us, hunter. Celebrations are in order.
Enjoy this. The Imps don't grovel often.
Our saviors have returned.
Imperials throughout the galaxy are celebrating your victory.
Malgus the Betrayer is dead! You have destroyed the false Emperor!
Not even Darth Malgus could weaken our grip on the galaxy!
Long live the Empire!
Hear, hear!
The next time you need a power-hungry Sith Emperor dethroned, let me know.
You're welcome.
The Imperial Guard will not permit another rogue usurper.
General Hesker provided invaluable support in the fight against Malgus.
Hesker deserves credit, too.
You humble me, my lord.
You are too kind.
I didn't save you for free.
We will not leave your services unrewarded, good hunter.
Of course. You've all earned the Empire's gratitude, and the trappings that come with it.
Be generous, Grand Moff. It is more than deserved.
No thanks needed, Grand Moff.
That is putting it lightly.
General Hesker. Your service to the Empire is flawless, as always. What news from the battlefield?
Our fleet suffered casualties, but the survivors escaped the station's blast. The Reclamation Service already scours the wreckage.
Excellent. Contrary to Malgus's claims, the Empire is stronger than ever. Meanwhile the traitor's flock is abandoning the flaming ruins of his heretical revolution.
Malgus's destroyed station will serve as a warning to all who entertain rebellion.
No one will oppose us now.
Even the Republic will fear the assassins of Malgus the Betrayer.
You're fortunate I didn't assume the Betrayer's throne, Grand Moff. The power I would have wielded....
I could have been Emperor.
Your power is too great to be chained to a throne, my lord.
The Republic may seek to take advantage of our weakened fleet.
We shouldn't celebrate yet.
They're busy recovering from their own failed offensive against the Betrayer.
Now that Malgus's word is out, you may encounter more traitors in your ranks.
Be on guard for more rebels.
The Dark Council will question all those with seditious tendencies.
The Empire's strength is waning. Our survival may depend on adopting some of the Betrayer's ideals.
Malgus may have had a point.
If you want to avoid another rift, you may want to consider some of Malgus's ideas.
Malgus made some good points.
The Dark Council has noted the traitor's creed. We shall discuss them elsewhere.
How will the Empire respond?
We were in a grave place. Intelligence disbanded, much of the Dark Council slain and the Children of the Emperor defeated. But a new age is upon us.
Already our strength rallies after the fall of Darth Malgus.
The Empire's power is surging, my lord. For the Sith, and all our citizens, we will rule the galaxy once more!
Thanks to your ever-loyal service, the Empire will rise to dominance again. And whatever your future within our ranks, it will be a glorious one!
The Empire will rise again. And we will always remember the hunter who secured our victory!
The Empire will rise to dominance again. And it will be thanks to you!
Remove the traitor from our Emperor's throne.
Welcome back, my lord. General Hesker spoke highly of your performance.
Well done, sir. General Hesker just reported your success.
We were just speaking of your exploits, hunter.
Congratulations are in order. We just heard news from the front lines.
The traitor Serevin deserved his death. The Voss made him weak.
Thanks to you, we've secured his stealth fighter, complete with coordinates to Malgus's cloaked station. General Hesker is prepping it for your final assault.
Malgus will realize our plan if we don't move quickly.
We must attack now.
The stealth fighter will be ready shortly, but first....
Serevin didn't stand a chance.
Of that, there is no doubt. But I'm afraid we have little time to celebrate.
Serevin shot the general down. Will he be cleared for pilot duty?
How is Hesker?
Hesker's bruised but unshakable. There's no keeping him from this fight.
But you mustn't leave just yet.
Moments after Darth Serevin's defeat, we received this message from the Betrayer.
Congratulations, Regus. Your servant has won Ilum. But victory still eludes you.
Congratulations, Grand Moff. Your pawns have won Ilum. But this changes nothing.
I have harnessed the Foundry's power. Once its droids assemble my stealth armada, I will crush what remains of your Empire with one blow.
Moff Phennir and I claimed the Foundry for the Empire, now the traitor's using it against us!
I gave that scum the Foundry!
It's time we pay back Malgus's deception.
What is the Foundry?
The "Foundry"?
An alien space station built to construct technology on a mass scale. We must escalate our attack plans.
I can't wait to wipe that smile off the traitor's face.
Smug fool.
Good. We can't afford to delay any longer.
Malgus has the upper hand.
Malgus may have the Foundry, but he's blind to our primary plan.
The stealth ship you seized is ready. We've fitted it with a homing beacon.
Our fleet will track your vessel as General Hesker flies you to the Betrayer's station. Once you're safely inside, we will attack.
Destroying Darth Baras has prepared you for this moment, my lord. Do not fail the Empire now.
Darth Thanaton was a precursor to this moment, my lord. Crush the false Emperor, and his revolution will crumble.
In killing Darth Tormen, you won our respect. Slay an Emperor, and we will forever be in your debt.
Today, an Empire will fall. Ensure that the casualty belongs to Malgus the Betrayer.
Hesker's waiting for you. Good luck.
We should have murdered the traitor when we had the chance!
Ah, my lord. You've worked alongside Malgus the Betrayer. Did you sense any signs of weakness?
Officer, excellent. You've observed Malgus the Betrayer in action. Did you detect any weaknesses?
Hunter, at last. Now that Malgus the Betrayer is your prey, do you recall any weaknesses we could exploit?
Good of you to join us. Perhaps your insight into Malgus the Betrayer will calm some tempers.
He thinks he's already won, but his impudence will ruin him.
Malgus is overconfident.
Malgus is blind to the realities of the galaxy. When we smother his ideals, his new Empire will crumble.
He is foolishly optimistic.
You're right, my lord.
He won't pass up the opportunity to parade his victory before us. When Malgus shows himself, we must be ready to strike.
Malgus suffers from arrogance.
An accurate assessment, sir.
He waited years to spring his trap. Now it's up to us to claw our way out.
Malgus is dangerously patient.
I'm afraid you're right, hunter.
Someone put Malgus in that mechanical mask. Once he rears his head, we'll break the rest of him.
He's hardly invincible.
I wasted years serving Malgus. He even asked me to join his treason. Of course I refused, but I should've spit in his face!
A true Imperial would have slain the traitor where he stood.
Regardless, the treacherous dog has stolen our Emperor's cloaked space station and fled into open space.
Talk won't kill Darth Malgus.
Malgus has guarded himself well. He stole our Emperor's cloaked space station and fled.
Grand Moff! Darth Malgus's forces are invading the planet! His ships came out of nowhere and troops are flooding out!
Alert the army, call for reinforcements! That gutless scum won't embarrass the Empire again!
If Malgus brought a stealth fighter here, the Empire will claim it.
Let's steal an invading ship.
You're right. A command fighter from Malgus's armada should have the station's coordinates on its nav computer.
If Malgus thinks he can pluck Ilum from the Empire's grasp, he's gravely mistaken.
The arrogant fool.
Malgus needs the Adegan crystals to complete his stealth armada.
He's come for Ilum's crystals.
Malgus has divided his strength by invading Ilum. Now's the time to attack.
He's spread himself too thin.
The traitor had no choice. He needs Ilum's Adegan crystals to supply his stealth armada.
Let me crush the invaders.
Let me crush the invaders.
We can turn this in our favor. A command fighter from Malgus's invading fleet should have his station's coordinates on its nav computer.
Finally, the traitor slips up. Steal one of his ships, and you can fly it straight back to Malgus's hidden space station.
Find me a pilot, and I'll secure that ship.
I will take care of it.
I would be proud to fly you into battle against the Betrayer.
I've never piloted a fleet ship before.
I don't know if I can fly it.
You won't have to. It would be my honor to fly you into battle against the Betrayer.
Malgus can't be that foolish.
Malgus is so busy gloating he'd never suspect such a bold move. You'll just need someone with the skills to pilot the stealth fighter.
Look no further. It would be my honor to serve as your pilot.
It feels like ages since we worked together on Corellia.
Again we join forces, Hesker.
I'll never forget fighting alongside the Conqueror of Corellia.
I knew you were a member of the Imperial Guard, but a pilot, too?
You can fly, General?
Combat and covert flying proficiency are a few of the skills I mastered in the Emperor's service.
I hope you're ready to teach Darth Malgus a lesson.
Pleased to meet you, General.
Punishing the traitor will be my extreme pleasure.
We need the Empire's top pilot for this mission, General.
I trust you're qualified.
I was commander of the Emperor's own attack squadron before joining the Guard. I will not fail you.
Good. This meeting is over.
Then it's settled. General Hesker will help you seize a stealth fighter and fly you to Malgus's station.
I will prepare my ship at once.
Hesker will drop you on the front lines. You must tear through the Betrayer's army to steal a ship from Malgus's fort.
Lead the Empire's defense, my lord. And if you find the leader of this invasion, destroy him.
Go with speed, sir. And if you encounter the leader of this invasion, you know what to do.
This mission is vital to the Empire's future, hunter. Succeed, and your loyalty will be generously rewarded.
Now go. Destroy whoever leads his invasion. Show Malgus that the Empire is stronger than he thinks.
Aruetyc hu'tuun!
